obj_dw_church_holywatercooler_slash_Step: * Above she waits^1, our beloved Holiness..^1. Surely pining for the salvation of a great hero./
* But^1, our legs^1, small and sweaty in excitement^1, find no hold in this accursed wall^1,/
* And so we fall^1, tumbling a'gain and a'gain./%
* Doomed are we^1, who thirst for love just out of reach!/%
* Artless^1, heartless^1, and a blasphemer are you!/
* When you drink^1, let the last drop taunt you everlasting!/%
* Blessed are you^1, who walks with our Lady!/
* And blessed be your legs^1, for they have nary a bead of sweat./%
* Oh^1, Holy Princess far above^1! If you would spare but a drop of your love.../
* I promise I should never spill it^1,/
* Or mix it with powders to modify its flavor./%
* Excepting^1, of course^1, such flavors of sweet Lemon and Orange^1,/
* Which are clean to the taste and invigorate the Humours./%
* Oh^1, I heard it^1! The clash!/
* You brute.../
* May your powders be acrid^1, green^1, and ectoplasmic!/%
* To think our Holy Princess would join your court..^1. oh^1, joy!/
* I shall rejoice^1, and throw my greatest powders.../
* Electrolytic^1, and few in calorie!/%
* Ah^1, my legs^1! So they tremble^1, I'm afeared I cannot clamber any further./
* Young soldier^1, if you should meet her^1, could you tell her of my exploits.../
* That I may earn so much as a small thimble of her love./%
* Go on^1, young soldier^1! I am but too sweaty to continue.../%
* You brute...^1! You coward...!/
* Spilling a woman's tears..^1. you have no sense of water conservation!/%
* I should knock you^1, if my legs were not so sweaty and small!/%
* Oh^1, so you found her^1! Did she have any extra thimbles of her love?/
* No...? Well^1, I hope she knows I could have also recruited her.../
* ..^1. If I had just climbed up there..^1. you see./%
* ..^1. well done and all that!/%
* (It's a regular container of water.)/
* (..^1. There's no reason to expect interacting with it to do anything.)/%
